summary: Prototype Pollution vulnerability (CVE-2022-25878) in protobufjs 6.11.2, a transitive dependency of the TypeScript SDK client. The vulnerability allows attackers to modify Object.prototype through untrusted input or .proto file parsing.
userImpact: Users of SDK client 0.23.0 are exposed to a prototype pollution attack via transitive protobufjs dependency.
rootCause: protobufjs version 6.11.2 contains unpatched prototype pollution vulnerability affecting Object.prototype manipulation
resolutionDetails: Automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was resolved or removed from the dependency inventory
keyQuote: protobufjs before 6.11.3 are vulnerable to Prototype Pollution which can allow an attacker to add/modify properties of the Object.prototype
